review_and_appreciate:
Review and Appreciate: Did you bring a focus to your thinking? Did you take steps toward developing a
  healthy mind? Find The Path.
quote: "One thing you can't hide - is when you're crippled inside" John Lennon

step_of_the_day.title: Take a step toward a healthy emotional state. Address any negative emotional residue (Pillar #6)
step_of_the_day.content:
Yesterday we discussed developing a healthy mind. Today it's a heathy heart. Any emotions that you have not
  worked through and let go of, help to create a "heavy heart". You want to do your best to "clear the
  slate" so to speak. Emotions that sit inside only create unconscious harmful patterns and distraction. If,
  for example, if you are carrying anger toward someone - resentment - this only hurts and distracts you - not
  them.

action_step:
Identify some piece of unfinished emotional business you are holding toward someone. Make the decision that
  this is too much of a burden on your emotional health and your ability to stay present and happy. Then take
  these steps:Acknowledge the feeling and what it's aboutAllow yourself to feel the feeling - without judgment andWith acceptance. Not that what you are upset about is ok, but that it happened, and you can't go back in
  time to change it.Find a way to express this feeling - with the intension of letting it goDecide that it's in your best interest to let go - and let go
journal_entry: Write about any difficulty you have in letting go of unfinished emotional business.
